author: wtopstaff
title: Bulls-Hornets, Box
text:
By The Associated Press October 19, 2015 9:29 pm CHICAGO (86) 
Snell 1-4 0-0 3, Mirotic 3-9 4-4 13, Noah 2-8 8-15 12, Hinrich 1-6 0-0 2, Butler 8-19 2-2 18, McDermott 2-7 0-0 5, Brooks 1-8 0-0 2, Gibson 6-7 2-2 14, Portis 6-11 0-1 12, Moore 2-6 0-0 5. Totals 32-85 16-24 86. CHARLOTTE (94) 
M.Williams 3-9 0-0 8, Zeller 0-3 1-2 1, Jefferson 3-9 3-4 9, Walker 8-16 3-7 22, Batum 5-12 3-4 14, Lin 6-8 5-9 18, Kaminsky 1-6 2-2 4, Lamb 0-2 0-0 0, Hawes 2-4 1-1 6, Hairston 4-5 1-1 11, Daniels 0-3 1-2 1. Totals 32-77 20-32 94. Chicago 33 18 21 14—86 Charlotte 33 17 23 21—94 
3-Point Goals_Chicago 6-27 (Mirotic 3-6, Moore 1-3, Snell 1-3, McDermott 1-5, Hinrich 0-3, Brooks 0-3, Butler 0-4), Charlotte 10-31 (Walker 3-8, Hairston 2-3, M.Williams 2-6, Hawes 1-1, Lin 1-1, Batum 1-6, Zeller 0-1, Daniels 0-2, Kaminsky 0-3). Fouled Out_Hinrich. Rebounds_Chicago 64 (Noah 13), Charlotte 54 (Lin 8). Assists_Chicago 20 (Noah 7), Charlotte 16 (Lin 5). Total Fouls_Chicago 26, Charlotte 16. Technicals_Chicago defensive three second. A_8,769 (19,077). Topics:
